Package jadex.testcases.beliefs

This package contains testcases related to beliefs.

See:
          Description

Capabilities
InitialBelief Test initial belief values.
 

Agents
Array Test array class as expression value.
BeanChanges Test bean property changes.
BeliefChanges Test belief changes.
BeliefSetChanges Test belief set changes Tests 1 and 2: Test if adding and removing facts trigger plan.
BeliefSetContains Test contains of belief sets.
DynamicBelief Test if dynamic beliefs are only evaluated on access.
Evaluationmodes Test the evaluation modes of expressions.
InitialBelief Test overwriting initial belief(set) values.
PropagateChanges This agent tests change propagation of beliefs (and goal parameters) Use the BDI-viewer to perform the test.
UpdatingBelief Test Auto Update Belief Agent.
WaitForFactAdded Test detection of added facts.
 

Package jadex.testcases.beliefs Description

This package contains testcases related to beliefs.
